title: Panjumittai
synopsis: When Appu (Ma Ka Pa) ties the knot with Ranji (Nikhil) and leads a happy life, their marriage gradually begins to disintegrate as the former starts suspecting an affair between his wife and his longtime friend from childhood Kuppu (Sendrayan).

title: Irumbuththirai
synopsis: Kathiravan (Vishal), a lanky army man who is battling anger management issues, borrows a bank loan by submitting fake documents due to dire circumstances. However, when the entire money from Kathir's account vanishes, he learns that an ominous hacker called White Devil (Arjun) is masterminding a series of cyber-scams. Kathir vows to track down White Devil at any cost and sets out to expose his modus operandi

title: Sema
synopsis: Kuzhandhai (GV Prakash Kumar), a vegetable vendor, finds his perfect match in pretty Magizhini (Arthana Binu). When everything goes well, Magizhini's father (Mansoor Ali Khan) calls off the engagement ceremony with Kuzhandhai after the son of an influential and rich local MLA lures him to get his daughter married to him. How Kuzhandhai and Magizhini, who have fallen in love with each other, unite forms the plot.

title: Bharath Ennum Naan
synopsis: Bharath (Mahesh Babu), a pragmatic youngster, returns to India after completing his graduation in London. Under critical circumstances, following the death of his father Raghav Ram (Sarath Kumar), Bharath gets anointed as the Chief Minister of the undivided Andhra Pradesh. While he strives for development-oriented and honest deeds for the people, he slowly gets sucked into the cobweb of politics by detractors.

title: Kaalakkoothu
synopsis: Easwaran (Prasanna) and Hari (Kalaiyarasan) are happy-go-lucky friends in Madurai although their friendship begins on a rough note. They lead a peaceful life as Hari is in love with Gayathri (Sai Dhanshika) and Easwaran falls for Revathi (Srushti Dange). However, their lives turn upside down when they ruffle weathers with the brother of a local politician.

title: Kaali
synopsis: Constantly haunted by a specific nightmare, an NRI doctor Bharat (Vijay Antony), after learning that he's an adopted child, decides to come to Tamil Nadu in search of his biological parents. His search leads to an interesting turn of events with a lot of twists.

title: Madurai Veeran
synopsis: Madura Veeran is a Tamil rural drama that subtly throws light upon the controversial sport, Jallikattu. The film begins with the central character Durai returning from Malaysia to Madurai to marry a girl, from his village. However, his true mission is to find his father s killer and also to participate in the sport of Jallikattu. With two communities in his village also at loggerheads with each other, will Durai be able to make things right before it s too late?

title: Iruttu Araiyil Murattu Kuthu
synopsis: Iruttu Arayil Murattu Kuthu is a Tamil movie starring Gautham Karthik and Vaibhavi Shandilya in prominent roles. It is a horror comedy directed by Santhosh P. Jayakumar.

title: Bhaskar Oru Rascal
synopsis: Two children raised by single parents want to enjoy the happiness of a complete family. To achieve this, they try to unite their parents, but end up in trouble.

title: Mercury
synopsis: Maimed from mercury poisoning, five friends try to cover up for an accident which caused a man to die. But problems and terror arise when they find the man out of the grave they buried him in.

title: Dhiya
synopsis: When Thulasi (Sai Pallavi) realizes that she is pregnant with her boyfriend Krishna's child (Naga Shourya), their parents persuade Thulasi to opt for abortion. However, the aborted child (Diya) vows to avenge everyone who separated her from Thulasi.

title: Pakka
synopsis: When Dhoni Kumar (Vikram Prabhu) rescues a heart-broken Nadhiya (Bindhu Madhavi) from her suicide attempt, he assures to find her lover Paandi (another Vikram Prabhu). However, Nadhiya later finds out that Dhoni Kumar is also a heart-broken person and listens to his love story.

title: Pallip Paruvathilae
synopsis: When an unassuming, studious Kalai (Nandhan Ram) falls in love with his classmate Kani (Venba), doting daughter of Ponvannan, she gradually begins to reciprocate. However, when Ponvannan and Kani's uncle Venba rebel against the love, Kalai's life undergoes a series of twists and turns.

title: Yenda Thalaiyila Yenna Vekkala
synopsis: When a happy-go-lucky, job-seeking Praveen (Azhar) meets Ramya during an interview, he falls in love with her at first sight. However, all hell breaks loose when Lord Yama picks Praveen and assigns him with four tasks before he ties the knot with Ramya. Why Yama chooses Praveen and whether the latter manages to finish the assigned tasks and marries Ramya or not forms the story.

title: Sollividava
synopsis: Prema Baraha, titled Sollividava in Tamil, is a 2018 Indian romantic drama film written and directed by Arjun Sarja.

title: Kaathadi
synopsis: Kaathadi is a Tamil movie released on 23 Feb, 2018. The movie is directed by S. Kalyan and featured Dhansika, Daniel Annie Pope, Rajendran and Kaali Venkat as lead characters. Other popular actors who were roped in for Kaathadi are Kaali Venkat, John Vijay, Sampath Raj, Kota Srinivasa Rao, Manobala and Jangiri Madhumitha.

title: Naachiyar
synopsis: The story of Naachiyaar is based on the life of a police officer Naachiyaar IPS (played by Jyothika), and the bold mission that she undertakes to uncover the truth about Kaathavarayan (played by G.V. Prakash Kumar) a young man who is accused of assaulting his girlfriend.

title: Savarakathi
synopsis: Pichaimoorthi aka Pichai (Director Ram), an incorrigible liar with an arrogant demeanor, ruffles the feathers of gangster Manga (Director Mysskin), who's out on a day-long parole, in a chance encounter on road. Manga sets out to avenge his humiliation and vows to kill Pichai at any cost.

title: Akilandakodi Biramanda Nayagan
synopsis: Brammanda Nayagan narrates the story of Rama (Akkineni Nagarjuna) who sets out in his journey to seek God. Denouncing all his worldly possessions, Rama heads to Tirumala to seek darshan of the Lord Venkateshwara.

title: Madura Veeran
synopsis: Durai (Shanmugapandian) arrives to his ancestral village in Madurai after 20 years in the pretext of marrying a girl from his native. However, Durai's real intention to come back to his village is to conduct Jallikattu, which once created a rift between his neighboring villages and led to the unfortunate demise of his righteous father Rathnavelu (Samuthirakani).

title: Nimir
synopsis: National Selvam (Udhayanidhi Stalin) is an affable photographer who runs a studio owned by his father (Mahendran) in Tenkasi. However, Selvam, in a failed attempt to calm nerves during a street brawl, gets beaten to the pulp by Velliappa (Samudhrakani) in front of the villagers. Selvam vows to avenge his humiliation and promises that he would never wear his slippers until he takes revenge on Velliappa.

title: Sketch
synopsis: Jeeva aka Sketch (Vikram), along with his group of friends, is entrusted with the duty of seizing the cars of loan defaulters in a garage run by Settu (Hareesh Peradi) in North Madras. But when Jeeva seizes deadly gangster Royapuram Kumar's (Baburaj) car, which he considers as a prized possession, the latter sets out to take revenge.

title: Padai Veeran
synopsis: Muneeshwaran (Vijay Yesudas), a good-for-nothing sluggard, decides to don the khaki after he realizes that people hold cops in high regard and that they can easily make money too. After he enters the police department, he is faced with a crisis: To take on his own people in his village, which is replete with deep-rooted caste politics.

title: Kalavaadiya Pozhuthugal
synopsis: When two ex-lovers get to meet after a long time, their old relationship begin to create ripples in their respective marital relation.

title: yemali
synopsis: Yemaali narrates the story of software workers Mali (Sam Jones) and Rithu (Athulya Ravi) who decide to break up after a major tiff. However, unhappy with the breakup decision, Mali vows to take revenge on Rithu, who goes on to lead a happy life, and seeks the help of his well-wisher Durai (Samuthirakani) to kill her.

title: Mannar Vagaiyara
synopsis: When Madhiyazhagan (Vemal) helps his brother (Karthik Kumar) unite with his ladylove and saves him from a desperate suicide attempt, he earns the animosity of Karthik's brother-in-law who is enraged about his sister's inter-caste marriage.

title: Balloon
synopsis: Jeevanandham (Jai) sets out to Ooty with his wife (Anjali) in search of a haunted house to seek inspiration for the horror script he's asked to prepare by a producer. However, little did Jai know that the haunted house has a eerie connection with his past.

title: Velaikkaran
synopsis: Arivu (Sivakarthikeyan), a principled youngster who lives in a slum, lands a job at a famous FMCG company. How his life turns topsy-turvy after he comprehends the greedy techniques capitalists employ to woo consumers forms the plot.

title: Vithi Mathi Ulta
synopsis: Adithya (Rameez), a carefree youngster, experiences a worst nightmare when he's asleep. To make things more terrifying, the events in the dream begin to happen in real life too when he wakes up.

title: Thiruttu Payale - 2
synopsis: When Selvam (Bobby Simha), a greedy surveillance expert, exploits his job to loot money from influential politicians, he finds himself in trouble after a womanizer (played by Prasanna) intrudes in his wife's privacy.

title: Sakka Podu Podu Raja
synopsis: Sakka Podu Podu Raja narrates the story of a happy-go-lucky youngster Santa (Santhanam), who falls in love with the sister of a deadly gangster. How he manages his relationship and whether he gets to marry the love of his life or not forms the plot.

stars.name: Vaibhavi Shandilya,Daniel Annie Pope,Power Star Srinivasan

title: Maayavan
synopsis: Kumaran (Sundeep Kishan), a determined police officer, sets out to investigate a series of murders happening in the city. When he finds out a few shocking similarities in murders, he realizes that there's more to it than what meets the eye.

title: Ulkuthu
synopsis: When Raja (Attakathi Dinesh) befriends Sura Shankar (Bala Saravanan) to enter his coastal village, he beats a deadly local don Saravanan (Dhilip Subbarayan) to pulp in a tiff. Saravanan's father Kaaka Mani (Sharath Lohitashwa) sets out to kill Raja, before the story takes an interesting turn.

stars.name: Dinesh Ravi,Nandita Swetha,Bala Saravanan,Rajendran,Chaya Singh,John Vijay

title: Kodiveeran
synopsis: How Kodi Veeran (Sasikumar) saves the life of his brother-in-law (played by Vidharth) from the deadly local don Villagam Vellakkaran (Pasupathi) to keep his sister's (Sanusha) life happier forms the plot.

title: Bhramma.Com
synopsis: How Kodi Veeran (Sasikumar) saves the life of his brother-in-law (played by Vidharth) from the deadly local don Villagam Vellakkaran (Pasupathi) to keep his sister's (Sanusha) life happier forms the plot.

title: Richie
synopsis: Intrigued by the multiple mysterious murders in the coastal town of Manappad, investigative journalist Megha (Shraddha Srinath) sets out to find out the truth. As she heads to Manappad, she finds out that everything revolves around a man called Richie (Nivin Pauly), about whom everyone has a different opinion of.

stars.name: Nivin Pauly,Shraddha Srinath,Ashok Selvan,Prakash Raj,Natarajan Subramaniam

title: Indrajith
synopsis: Indrajith (Gautham Karthik), a happy-go-lucky youngster, accompanies professor Mayilvaganan (Sanjay Khedekar), an ex-director of Archeological Survey of India (ASI), in his quest to search a mystical stone with incredible medicinal benefits hidden somewhere in a forest in North East India. However, Kapil Sharma (Sudhanshu Pandey), the incumbent director of ASI, attempts to take possession of the stone before Indrajith and his team.

stars.name: Gautham Karthik,Prathap K Pothan,Sachin Khedekar,Sonarika Bhadoria

title: En Aaloda Seruppa Kaanom
synopsis: Sandhya (‘Kayal’ Anandhi) loses her slippers bought by her father while travelling in a bus. Tamizh (Pakoda Pandi of Goli Soda, Pasanga fame) quickly gets down from the bus in the quest for the slippers of Sandhya, his one-sided love. Meanwhile, a group of militants abduct Sandhya’s father (Jayaprakash) in Syria, and a Godwoman predicts that her father will be safe once she finds the slippers.

title: Theeran Adhigaaram Ondru
synopsis: After a string of ghastly murders of residents along the highway, a determined, sincere cop Theeran (Karthi) sets out to find the gang of ruthless dacoits with the only evidence of a fingerprint.

stars.name: Karthik Sivakumar,Rakul Preet Singh,Abhimanyu Singh,Bose Venkat

title: Ippadai Vellum
synopsis: Madhusudhanan (Udhayanidhi Stalin), a happy-go-lucky software engineer, is on the lookout for a new job and settle down by tying the knot with his long-time beau Barghavi (Manjima Mohan). In another track, Kuzhadaivelu (Soori), a careless dubbing artiste, is in desperate need of money for his wife's pregnancy. When Madhu and Kuzhandai happen to meet terrorist Chota (Daniel Balaji) coincidentally, police arrest them thinking that both are Chota's co-conspirators. How Madhu and Kuzhandai prove their innocence forms the story.

title: Aangila Padam
synopsis: What a wealthy businessman dupes four innocent people for his personal gain, the quartet decides to take a revenge on the businessman to teach him a lesson.

title: Nenjil Thunivirunthal
synopsis: A young man tries to track down the killers who are plotting to murder his close friend.

title: Vizhithiru
synopsis: Several characters encounter different issues in their personal and professional lives. How their diverse problems intersect and lead to an interesting turn of events form the story, making for a gripping hyperlink thriller.

title: Kalathur Gramam
synopsis: The film revolves around a highly traumatized young boy who grows up with his grand parents to avenge the death of his father by an influential person (Kishore) in the village.

title: Kadaisi Bench Karthi
synopsis: Kadaisi Bench Karthi is a Tamil-Telugu bilingual comedy that highlights the ill effects that a smartphone can have in romantic relationships.

title: Chennaiyil Oru Naal 2
synopsis: The story revolves around two bad guys who struggle with forces of good and evil while exploring the psychological secret that most people tend to bury deep within their consciousness.

title: Meyaadha Maan
synopsis: Meyaadha Maan is a hilarious romantic musical that follows the lives of Idhayam Murali. The film celebrates love, friendship, and family.

title: Ka.Ka.Ka.Aabathin Arikuri
synopsis: Kavitha Punyakodi (Sakshi Agarwal), a college-going young girl, possesses bizarre supernatural powers and is believed to bring good fortune to people who follow her. However, an unanticipated incident in a nightclub changes her entire life.

title: Rubaai
synopsis: Bharani (Kayal Chandran) and Babu (Kishore Ravichandran), who make ends meet with their lorry, have to pay their dues to a financier, who is consistently nagging them. Meanwhile, Mani Sharma (Harish Uttaman), a ruthless criminal, dumps his bagful of looted money from a bank in Bharani's lorry after being chased by cops.

title: Magalir Mattum
synopsis: Prabhavathi (Jyotika), an independent and progressive documentary filmmaker, reunites her to-be mother-in-law with two of her childhood friends. Prabha takes them on an impromptu road trip to break the shackles of their conventional day-to-day lives.

title: Pichuva Kaththi
synopsis: How corrupt government servants push a bunch of carefree but innocent youngsters into the world of crimes instead of reprimanding their mistakes forms the plot.

title: Thappu Thanda
synopsis: A greedy ex-MLA orders his sidekicks to disburse Rs. 5 crores to the voters in his constituency to win back his seat. However, the bagful of money goes missing when it gets transported from Chennai to Dindivanam. What follows is an intriguing crime thriller with interesting twists and turns.

title: Vaasuki
synopsis: A heinous crime meted out to her from the past haunts Vasuki (Nayanthara), a brooding Kathakali artist. How she takes revenge on her perpetrators forms the plot.

title: Puriyatha Puthir
synopsis: Kathir (Vijay Sethupathi), a righteous, aspiring music composer, falls in love with Meera (Gayathrie), an unassuming music teacher. When Kathir starts receiving private pictures and compromised videos of Meera on his phone, he sets out to find the mysterious sender and his motive behind it.

title: Kathanayagan
synopsis: When a timid Thambi Durai (Vishnu Vishal) falls head over heels for Kanmani (Catherine Tresa) and goes to her home with his parents for a wedding proposal, Kanmani's dad rejects him stating his cowardly nature. How Thambi Durai overcomes his fear and convinces Kanmani's dad forms the plot.

title: Kurangu Bommai
synopsis: A riveting hyperlink thriller which involves a terrifying saw-mill owner-cum-gangster Ekambaram (PL Thenappan), his staunchly loyal friend Sundaram (Bharathiraja), a money-hungry middleman Sekhar (Elango Kumaravel), an irresistible pickpocketer and a good-for-nothing father who is in desperate need of money to conduct his daughter's wedding. All of them are united by a bag (Kurangu Bommai), which has a truckload of cash according to a few and an expensive statue according to a few.

title: Neruppuda
synopsis: Guru (Vikram Prabhu) and his friends aspire to become firefighters and respect the job so much. However, an unfortunate skirmish with a gangster Sadha (Vincent), a longtime friend of deadly don 'Pulianthope' Ravi (Madhusudhana Rao), leaves their firemen aspirations in jeopardy. How they disentangle themselves from the murder forms the story.

title: Kadhal Kasakuthaiya
synopsis: Diya, a twelfth standard school girl, due to peer pressure and her surroundings, is in quest of her love. She finds a twenty-five-year-old Arjun, who is a software engineer by profession, as her perfect match and tries to impress him. How Diya wins her love overcoming all the social stigma forms the main part of the story.

title: VIP 2
synopsis: After winning the Engineer of the Year Award at Anitha Constructions, Raghuvaran is leading a content life with his wife, Shalini. Problems arise when Vasundhara, the powerful head honcho of a leading construction company, offers Raghuvaran a job and he refuses it outright. Thus begins a squabble between the two, where winning means staying a step ahead of each other.

title: Panam Pathinonnum Seiyum
synopsis: What happens when an exorbitant party fund of a politician worth Rs 10 crores goes missing? A merry-go-round between the lead characters ensues, and who takes the money away forms the plot.

title: Podhuvaga Emmanasu Thangam
synopsis: A young villager woos the daughter of a rich man hoping that her father would do good for his village. What he doesn’t know is that the father is actually waiting to take revenge on the villagers for a slight mistake made years ago.

title: Nibunan
synopsis: A deputy superintendent of police (DSP) and his two subordinates are on a mission to hunt down a psychotic serial killer, whose murder patterns and method are always so flawless and ironclad. The investigation leads the trio down the dark paths of the case, where they discover a haunting secret.

title: Taramani
synopsis: An orthodox youngster and a free-spirited lady fall in love, only to understand that they are different in all aspects of life. How do they realise their complex requirements and mistakes?

title: Sathura Adi 3500
synopsis: The movie begins with the suicide of an unassuming civil engineer Stephen (Akash). A sincere cop Karuna (Nikhil Mohan) is assigned to the investigate the suspicious death of Stephen. However, the investigation takes an unexpected turn when Karuna sees Akash on various instances during the probe.

title: Vikram Vedha
synopsis: The film is a dramatic, action thriller. On one side is the righteous cop Vikram, who believes in a clear demarcation between good and evil and sees things clearly as black and white.

title: Gemini Ganeshanum Suruli Rajanum
synopsis: Gemini Ganesan (Atharvaa), a romantic youngster, has a compulsive desire to woo beautiful-looking girls. But, he is not ready to get into a serious relationship with anyone. How his mischievous activities impact the lives of his girlfriends and how he realizes his mistakes forms the plot.

title: Pandigai
synopsis: Velu (Krishna) is in desperate need of money to go abroad for a job and settle for good. When he meets Muni (Saravanan), a compulsive gambler, the duo decide to participate in a underground street fight conducted by the powerful gangster Natwar Dada (Madhusoodhanan). However, when Muni and Velu realize that the matches are being manipulated by Dada, they decide to get back their money by robbing him.

title: 7 Naatkkal
synopsis: When Jennifer (Angana Rai), a young Balle dancer is murdered under mysterious circumstances, shreds of evidence lead to Siddharth (Rajiv Pillai), the spoilt brat of a wealthy businessman Vijay Prabhakar (Prabhu). To protect Siddharth, Vijay seeks the help of crime branch officer Sai Prasath (Ganesh Venkatraman) who frames Gautham Krishna (Sakthi), a vibrant RJ and his neighbor Pooja (Nikesha Patel) in the case.

title: Thiri
synopsis: Jeeva (Ashwin), a final year mechanical engineering student, engages in a skirmish with Kishore (Arjai) inadvertently, unawareof the fact that the latter is an arrogant son of an influential politician Anganan (AL Azhagappan). Jeeva receives a bad conduct certificate from his college management, which is owned by Anganan. How Jeeva tackles Kishore and Anganan with the help of his friends forms the plot.

title: Adhagappattathu Magajanangalay
synopsis: Anand (Umapathy) aspires to be a guitarist and his father (played by Pandiarajan) considers the guitar as a prized possession of his family. While trying to substitute his friend to guard a bungalow for a night, Anand gets embroiled in a burglary attempt and loses his guitar. How he gets back his guitar forms the plot.

title: Vanamagan
synopsis: A jungle-dweller who is injured and has no memory of his past winds up in the care of a spoiled, rich girl.

title: Ivan Thanthiran
synopsis: Two engineering dropouts stumble upon the activities of a corrupt education minister and set out to expose him.

title: Vilayattu Aarambam
director: Vijay R Anand, Arun Mozhi Chozan

title: Munnodi
synopsis: Munnodi is a story of deceit, friendship, betrayal, and brotherhood. An interesting action thriller with high-octane stunts and a steady flow of underlying emotions.

title: Pagadi Aattam
synopsis: Suriya is a rich and spoiled guy who cheats young girls with his charm and good looks. He is abducted. Following this, his worried parents (Nizhalgal Ravi and Sudha) file a complaint with ACP Devendra Kumar (Rahman). Well, will Devendra Kumar rescue Suriya? And who is that abductor?

title: Rum
synopsis: What happens when a gang of robbers head to a bungalow to pull off a heist and realize that the house is haunted.

title: Enakku Vaaitha Adimaigal
synopsis: Krishna, an IT professional, and the story narrates the two phases of his life - the first when he falls in love, and the second after his break-up.

title: Mo
synopsis: When Dev(Suresh Ravi), Sathish (Ramesh Thilak) and Kumar (Darbuka Siva), three petty con men, along with makeup man Joseph Chellappa (Munishkanth) and an aspiring actress Priya (Aishwarya Rajesh), who cheat people for money by staging fake exorcism acts, land a deal in an apartment, one of them gets possessed by a real ghost. The consequences they face there onwards form the plot.

title: Veera Sivaji
synopsis: Shiva (Vikram Prabhu), a call taxi driver, in his quest to arrange money for the immediate surgery of his neighbor's cute little daughter, whom he loves so much, he gets entangled in a huge counterfeit scam spearheaded by John Vijay. How he steers clear from the gang forms the plot.

title: Chennai 600028 II
synopsis: The boys of Chennai 28 are grown-up men in Chennai 28 Part II. The Sharks XI team heads to Theni to attend the wedding of Ragu (Jai) with his girlfriend Anu (Sana Altaf). When they decide to participate in a local tournament in Theni, they face a stiff opposition in Marudhupandi (Vaibhav), who would go to any lengths to win cricket matches. However, an unforeseen incident puts Ragu's marriage in danger. Whether he ties the knot with Anu or not forms the plot.

title: Achamindri
synopsis: Achamindri is an 2016 Indian Tamil thriller film based on A pickpocket, his girlfriend and a cop become the targets of an education racket.  Movie directed by Ennamo Nadakkudhu fame Rajapandi. It stars Vijay Vasanth, Samuthirakani, Srushti Dange, Saranya Ponvannan, and Radha Ravi.

title: Achcham Yenbadhu Madamaiyada
synopsis: When Simbu, a happy-go-lucky and jobless MBA graduate, falls heads over heels for Leela (Manjima Mohan), his sister's friend, an interesting friendship blooms between the two. When STR decides to go on a bike trip to Kanyakumari, Leela, in an impromptu way, tags along. However, an accident sets forth an unexpected turn of events.

title: Remo
synopsis: SK (Sivakarthikeyan) is a happy-go-lucky youngster who aspires to be an actor. When he lands an opportunity to act, the role demands him to don the makeover of a nurse. However, when SK meets Kavya (Keerthy Suresh), a doctor, he falls in love at first sight. SK disguises as a nurse (Remo) to woo Kavya, who is already engaged, and make her fall in love with him.

title: Meow
synopsis: Four friends get mysteriously murdered one after the other in an apartment and it leads to a huge havoc among the residents. A cat also plays an important role in this supernatural horror thriller

title: Ilami
synopsis: They decide to settle scores for once and all by conducting a Jallikattu competition. What happens there onwards form the plot.

title: Meenkuzhambum Manpaanayum
synopsis: A father and son, who fail to understand each other, decide to sort out their issues with the help of their family friend in an unusual and bizarre way.

title: Enakku Innoru Per Irukku
synopsis: Johnny is a happy-go-lucky guy who is mistaken as a notorious gangster by Anandhi's father. The movie deals with whether they get married or not.

title: Appa
synopsis: It's all about father and son. A father who nurtures his son and makes him a good man in this society. He teaches many fathers about fatherhood and their responsibilities. This film shows about friendship, education, infatuation, love and family sentiments. This is another film which tears the face of the educational system. "APPA " movie is treat to many children, lesson for parents.

title: Manithan
synopsis: A struggling lawyer (Udhayanidhi Stalin) files a motion to reopen a hit-and-run case involving the heir to a business fortune. Udhayanidhi Stalin and Hansika Motwani in the lead roles. Directed by I. Ahmed, this comedy flick has music composed by Santhosh Narayanan.

title: Paisa
synopsis: The story of 'Paisa' turns around a slumdog ragpicker played by Sriram. How his life changes when finds a sac full of money forms the rest of the story.

title: Meera Jaakirathai
synopsis: A visual communication student sets out to trace the mysterious story behind an infamous bridge with his friends, and ends up with interesting revelations. The film has Bobby Simha and Monisha plays the lead roles.

title: Vetrivel
synopsis: A brother tries to get his younger brother married to the girl he loves by kidnapping her, but the plan goes so wrong and results in messy circumstances. Movie directed by Vasanthamani which features Sasikumar and Miya George in the lead roles.

title: Ennul Aayiram
synopsis: The life of a young, happy go lucky bartender turns upside down when he meets two girls in his life at different times. Ennul Aayiram directed by Krishnakumar has Maha, Mareena Michael and Shruthiyugal playing the leads.

title: Metro
synopsis: The story circles around a journalist goes after a chain snatching crimes in Chennai city. National Award winner Bobby Simha has played a pivotal role in the movie.

title: Amma Kanakku
synopsis: The movie is the official remake of the Hindi film Nil Battey Sannata which talks about the emotional bonding between a mother and a daughter. Amma Kanakku starring AmalaPaul, Samudrakani and Revathi is produced by Dhanush's Wunderbar Films banner along with Anand L. Rai

title: Oru Melliya kodu
synopsis: A rich business woman is murdered and her body goes disappeared, putting her husband high on the investigating cop's suspect list. Arjun and Shaam along with Manisha Koirala in the lead roles. Directed by AMR Ramesh.

title: Unnodu Ka
synopsis: Siva and Abhirami are neighbours and close family friends. Their parents belong to the same village and have escaped to Chennai to lead a peaceful life, because the village is divided into two factions due to a generation feud. The parents wish to have get children married to each other which they see as the only way to put an end to the feud

title: Ko 2
synopsis: Ko 2 revolves around a man who kidnaps the chief minister of the state and the mystery over why he does so.

title: Iraivi
synopsis: Iraivi is about women, men and their priorities. It talks about women's freedom, how men look at it and how women use it.The film is based on the women we see around us and how certain things stay the same, no matter what class or background they belong to.
A Sci-Fi family revenge drama happening between a scientist, his evil brother and the scientist's son, over a time travel gadget.

title: Enakkul oruvan
synopsis: The plot starts with the protagonist being in a state of coma and continuing only on life support. The film, from the beginning, tells two stories of the same person, one in colour and the other in black and white.

title: Dummy Tappasu
synopsis: The  plot revolves around the life of a fat and chubby guy who lives in a Chennai slum. Even though the people of the Chennai slum are poor, they lead a happy life.

A story about two warring villages and then without warning changes tracks to become a wannabe dark heist comedy. It takes close to three hours of tedious viewing to even figure out who is who and why they are doing what they do.

title: Aagam
synopsis: An ambitious youngster who feels very strongly about brain drain, gets embroiled in a conspiracy, which borders on what they call, knowledge terrorism.

title: Zero
synopsis: The movie starts off with the story of how the god created people and how Adam and Eve came into being, and then the screen moves to the present where they show newly wedded couple Bala and Priya moving in to their new apartment.

title: Pencil
synopsis: Pencil is a 2016 Indian Tamil thriller film written and directed by debutant Mani Nagaraj and produced by S. P. Ragavesh. The film features G. V. Prakash Kumar and Sri Divya in the lead roles, with the former also composing the film's music. The film was released on 13 May 2016.

title: Darling 2
synopsis: Darling 2 is based on a real incident that happened in Sathish's Chandrasekaran's life when he went to a trip with his friends and turning holiday into a nightmare. Darling 2 directed by Sathish Chandrashekar which has Kalaiyarasan, Rameez Raja and Maya in the lead roles.

title: Rajathandhiram
synopsis: Arjun and his two friends make a living out of conning people for a few thousands and are quite good at it. When Arjun falls for a girl, Michelle, he agrees to Deva's plan of stepping up to nail a big con job so that he can help her from financial stress. The con job sets off a chain of events that lead to a riveting cat-and-mouse game with a heist at its fulcrum.

title: Nagaraja Cholan MA, MLA
synopsis: Compared to the previous works of the Manivannan-sathyaraj duo this films leaves a lot to be desired but still quite enjoyable in patches. the dialogues by itself could've been released separately as an audio track. The main drawback is the script as the character of sathyaraj is made so powerful but there is no one to take him on which leaves a sour taste as sathyaraj scores one side goals throughout the movie all though there is a twist in the climax it was too late! The chemistry between manivannan and sathyaraj on screen should be seen to be believed, accompanied by astute dialogues this political had greater potential to be a landmark movie in the lines of it's predecessor Amaidhi Padai but the weak characterization of the support cast and an average script foiled a potential classic. Watch for the witty dialogues and the magnetism exuded by the "Villain" Sathyaraj!

title: Narathan
synopsis: Vishnu (Nakul) is on his way from Coimbatore for his new job and also to see his Fiance who is his uncle's daughter. During his journey he meets Pavitra (Nikesha Patel) and upon his arrival in Chennai, problems begin. Simultaneously Narathan (Premji) a renowned movie director is at his uncle's place who is also a movie producer. Narathan narrates his story to Vishnu's uncle and interestingly all the incidents have been happening in Vishnu's and all the other people's lives.

title: Vaaliba Raja
synopsis: The film begins with Karthik (Sethu) meeting psychiatrist Valeba Raja (Santhanam) to discuss about his life story. Apparently Karthik has two love stories. He falls in love with Sweety (Nushrath Bharucha) on first sight but when she bashes a guy for wrongly interpreting her friendship as love, our hero decides to put 'Project Sweety' on hold. Meanwhile, Karthik's family plans to marry him to Shalu (Vishaka Singh) but the former tells about his so-called love story to the latter and she offers to help him out by telling her parents they need fifteen days to take a firm decision on wedding. During the process, Shalu and Karthik develop a liking for each other but suddenly Sweety too reciprocates his love to our hero. The rest of the story is all about whether Karthik marries Shalu or not.

title: Sarabham
synopsis: Vikram is a budding architect who dreams of making big money with his next project, a theme park to be built by millionaire Chandrasekaran's company. His dreams are shattered when the latter rejects the proposal over trivial issues. A devastated Vikram is driven to desperation and decides to vent his anger on Chandrasekaran, but co-incidentally crosses the life of his daughter Shruti who shares a strained relationship with her father. Both are in need of money and decide to dupe the millionaire. Though he succeeds, Vikram realizes soon that he is being played and framed. A sinister plot unveils to twist the fate of one and all to build up for an unexpected climax

title: Sathuranga Vettai
synopsis: Ace conman Gandhi effortlessly thinks up schemes to swindle gullible and greedy folks. However on a rare occasion, things don't go according to plan and he ends up in the clutches of a ruthless gang who demand schemes from him for money.

title: Thirudan Police
synopsis: Viswa (Dinesh) is a good for nothing guy who lives in a police colony and is son of an honest constable (Rajesh). It follows the conflict between a disciplinarian father and his wayward son. One day the constable dies in line of duty and the son gets his father's job. The rest of the story is how Viswa becomes from a reluctant cop to a disciplined guy, who takes revenge against those who murdered his father.

title: Lingaa
synopsis: Lingaa is an upcoming Tamil action thriller film being directed by K. S. Ravikumar, who also scripted the film in collaboration with the film's dialogue writer, Pon Kumaran. The film stars Rajinikanth playing dual role, Jagapati Babu, Anushka Shetty and Sonakshi Sinha in the lead roles. Music is being composed by A. R. Rahman while cinematography was headed by R. Rathnavelu. This is slated to get released only in Tamil, Telugu and Hindi language.

title: Pizza II: Villa
synopsis: ebin (Ashok Selvan)is a budding writer waiting to get his work published. His long-time girlfriend Aarathy (Sanchita) is the only person who can handle his moods. Jebin is also upset that his father (Nasser) left him with nothing other than a villa in Puducherry. And when he reaches the villa, it unlocks some dark secrets.

title: Massu Engira Masilamani
synopsis: Masss aka Masilamani (Suriya) and his friend (Premji Amaren), two con-men, meet with a fatal accident when they were returning with money after a robbery. Thereafter, Masss attains the special ability to see ghosts/spirits around him. A Ghost named Shakthi(Suriya) sought the help of Masss and in return it promises to trace the money lost at the time of accident.

title: Masani
synopsis:
Masani takes place in a village in the Salem District where various sculptors come to make a statue. The village head, played by Sarath Babu, and his wife, played by Roja, try to bring in sculptors to complete the statue. However, anyone who comes for the job is driven out of the village by a ghost. The villagers decide to entrust the job to another big man, Aadukalam Naren. Trouble erupts between the two families.

A flashback reveals the reason for this. Ramki and Iniya make their appearances, where the audience learns of their love for one another. Agitated, Roja kills Ramki. Iniya dies delivering a boy. The boy, named Vishva, grows up and comes to the village to finish the task.

title: Thiranthidu Seese
synopsis: Two bartenders discover an unconscious girl in the restroom of their pub, who wakes up and accuses them of raping her even though she has no recollection of who of the two did it. And she decides to find out in her own way

title: Soodhu Kavvum
synopsis: Pagalavan, Kesavan and Sekar are three friends, who lose their jobs in Chennai due to certain circumstances. Then they come across Das (Vijay Sethupathy), who runs a smart kidnap for ransom scam. Naturally his crime flourishes, and the three friends team up with him. Their path crosses with that of Arumai Prakasam, son of the state finance minister. Denied capital by his very strict father to start his business Arumai Prakasam stages his own kidnap, but ends up in the hands of Das and co. The comedy of errors takes a turn when the finance minister wants to catch the culprits, and gives the task to a very strict, encounter specialist cop, Brahmma. How Das and co try to stay ahead of the cop and how he nabs them, and what happens forms the rest of the story.

title: Kalam
synopsis: An extortionist acquires a mansion and gifts it to his estranged son not realising the gruesome history behind the place.

title: Poriyaalan
synopsis: Saravanan, a civil engineer, decides to start his own construction company. He arranges money and buys land from Sastri, a real-estate broker. Only later does he realize that Sastri is an untraceable fraud and that the land is not his own.

title: Irukku Aana Illai
synopsis: The movie begins in a bar, where an aspiring director meets his friends. One of his friend, Meenakshi Sundaram (Aadhavan) says he has a beautiful horror story script from his own experience and narrates what happened in his friend's life.

title: Vethu Vettu
synopsis: Vethu Vettu talks about an underlying issue about love and the impact it has on the younger generation. The rules that make the youngsters exploit it to their advantage. Love marriages are still seen as a crime in many families and the extent they go to stop their kids pursuing their love can be sometimes nerve wrecking. Watch Vethu Vettu in theatres to know more.

title: Murugatrupadai
synopsis: We have all been a witness to college politics at some point in our lives, especially between art college students and the engineering college students. Murugatrupadai deals with students from different walks of life and how they learn to embrace their difference. The first half deals with the disputes, love, drama and friendship between the art college students and the engineering college students and in the second half they slowly begin to protest against unfair cast and class differences. Do they succeed? Can Engineering College students and Art College students really be friends? Do these youngsters stand together for a cause? What happens between them? Watch Murugatrupadai to find out!

title: Anjala
synopsis: The film is about a family that is determined to save their ancestral tea shop from being demolished. They strive to save it even after receiving multiple threats from the government. Will they manage to save their legacy? That forms the crux of the story.

title: Sowkarpettai
synopsis: The story is about two lovers who are murdered by villains. They come back as ghosts and start taking revenge on the people who killed them.

title: Aviyal
synopsis: Aviyal is an independent Tamil anthology film written and directed by six directors such as Alphonse Putharen, Shameer Sultan, Mohit Mehra, Lokesh Kanagaraj and Guru Smaran.
director: Alphonse Putharen, Mohit Mehra, Shameer Sultan, Lokesh Kanag

title: Nayyapudai
synopsis: Nayyappudai is about a man who joins the army and comes back to the his village after retiring as an officer. He faces an incident that challenges him and changes things forever.

title: Adhibar
synopsis: Adhibar is a 2015 Tamil action film directed by Surya Prakash. The film stars Jeevan and Vidya Pradeep in the leading roles with Nandha, Ranjith and Samuthirakani playing supporting roles.

title: Sawaari
synopsis: Sawaari is an Indian Tamil language film written and directed by Guhan Senniappan. The film features Benito Franklin, Sanam Shetty, Karthik Yogi, Mathivanan Rajendran in the leading roles, with Vishal Chandrasekhar composing the film's music.

title: Vai Raja Vai
synopsis: Karthik has a unique condition which makes him able to see what can happen in the immediate future. As a kid, he struggles to put it to smart use and ends up getting rebuked and the condition becomes dormant gradually as he refuses to entertain it. Now when he leads a content life, it resurfaces again and he fears it may spoil his happy life. As fate has its way, he ends up using it while gambling and gets caught in a web of greedy gamblers and how he deals with this ordeal is what the rest of the movie presents to us.

title: Megha
synopsis: An injured Mugil (Ashwin) collapses in front of Angana Roy who happens to be his fiancÃ©e as well as a nurse working at a hospital. After recovering, Mugil starts narrating his own brewing love story with Megha (Srushti). The movie switches back and forth where the romance portions are narrated in the flashback and an intriguing series of sequences happen at the hospital.

title: Vil Ambu
synopsis: Vil Ambu is a journey of two characters and talks about how humans are responsible for each other's loss or gain. The story is about how the loss of one person becomes the gain of the other.

title: Navarasa Thilagam
synopsis: A wastrel tries to get the hand of the girl he is in love with. But convincing her father will be most difficult.

title: Sethupathi
synopsis: The murder of a fellow cop is investigated by ace Inspector Sethupathi who approaches the case intelligently taking the untraveled route to arrive at a solution. The case with all its twists & turns ultimately makes him go head-on with the big shot Vaathiyar, which puts his job and family at stake

title: Jil Jung Juk
synopsis: In 2020, three young blokes, Jil, Jung & Juck with nothing in common between them, are assigned the task of transporting an Ambassador car coated with Cocaine-paint by the dreaded drug-lord, Dheivanayagam. Along the way they encounter Narasimhan with an almost identical car who makes small talk & tries to gel with the trio. After a night of drinking the trio escape the pub without his knowledge. But only later do they realize that in a drunken stupor they have taken Narasimhan's car & not their own.

title: Idhu Enna Maayam
synopsis: Arun (Vikram Prabhu) runs a drama troupe with like-minded friends but sadly there is no big reception. In order to make some money, they start a firm called Unnal Mudiyum Thambi (UMT) through with they literally write script and execute it to help the romantically challenged youngsters. Everything goes well until a businessman called Santhosh (Navdeep) approaches UMT as he badly wants to marry Maya (Keerthi Suresh)

title: Ainthu Ainthu Ainthu
synopsis: Aravind (Bharath)loses his girl friend Liyana (Mirthika)in a car accident and he lives with her memories. But, people around him try to make him believe that he is just hallucinating and no such person existed. The rest of the story shows whether he has been hallucinating about a non-existed girl friend or if there was really one.

title: Anjaan
synopsis: Raju Bhai and Chandran head a thriving gang dismantling everyone coming their way. However when their success reaches the dreaded Imran, they face the inevitable. It is now up to Krishnan, Raju Bhai's brother, to take revenge.

title: Visaranai
synopsis: A group of immigrants are detained by the local state police, tortured and forced to admit to a crime they have no knowledge of. When all hope seems to be lost, a policeman from their hometown speaks on their behalf at the court hearing, setting them free. The policeman asks for a return favor and the boys oblige, oblivious to the ill fate that awaits them. As they unwittingly bear witness to a political treason, the system seeks to silence them, at any cost. But Pandi is determined to be heard.

title: Gethu
synopsis: A sniper assassin's mission creates dire consequences for a librarian's family.

title: Velaiyilla Pattathari
synopsis: After years of unemployment Raghuvaran gets his dream job, but a powerful rival is keen to put him down.

title: Vaalu
synopsis: A man has limited time in which to make a woman fall in love with him.

title: Yennai Arindhaal
synopsis: A cop, while fighting an old rival, learns about himself.

title: Rajini Murugan
synopsis: A jobless youth whose main pass time is to spend time with his friends. After a family dispute that causes rifts between his brother and the rest of his family, Rajini Murgan decides to give his brother a lesson.

title: Veeran Muthu Raku
synopsis: Veeran Muthu Raku is an Tamil action - romantic movie direction by Rajasekaran and produced by Shanmugam. The has few faces, Namo Narayanan and Aadukalam Naren in lead roles.

title: Katham Katham
synopsis: A good cop is forced to work under a bad cop.

title: Pappali
synopsis: Pappali is a crude and crass comedy laced with sentiments.

title: Thiruttu Rail
synopsis: A gangster tries to pass off his death by getting his look-alike to be killed in a police encounter. But what he doesn't take into account is the dead man's friends.

title: Peigal Jaakkirathai
synopsis: Saravanan, who has suicidal tendencies, becomes part of Annachi's household as the latter, who has a fear of ghosts, believes that he will help him get rid of it. But the young man has a near-death experience after which he starts seeing ghosts!

title: Kaththi
synopsis: Two look-a-likes focusing on the burning issues of farmers committing suicide due to corporate encroachment.

title: Bhooloham
synopsis: The story is about how North madras local boxer "Boolagam" beats international boxer Nathan Jones.

title: Vetrimaran IPS
synopsis: The story is based on a police officer who investigates about a missing girl and how children go out of control without parental guidance. Produced by V.N. Bharathi, M.G. Sreekumar has scored the music for the film.The film deals about the illegal activities

title: Naan Than Bala
synopsis: A story of two friends. One is calm and the other one is a thug. The story reveals how their life change

title: Thoppi
synopsis: A young man from a community of robbers aspires to become a cop and acts as an informer. However, the local inspector and a minister are keen to see him out of their way.

title: Theriyama Unna Kadhalichitten
synopsis: A young couple flees to a hill station to escape familial opposition.

title: Ra
synopsis: First half is full of mystery surrounds the hero. Second half solving mystery knots .

title: Pattaya Kelappanum Pandiya
synopsis: The plot revolves around a mini bus driver Velpandiyan and a conductor and how romance evolves with Kanmani in the bus.

title: Oru Oorla Rendu Raja
synopsis: Two good-for-nothing men finally discover their purpose in life when a doctor gets into a legal battle with a factory owner.

title: Marumunai
synopsis: Kathir (Maruthi), a medical college student from a poor family, falls in love with Charumathi (Mrudhula Bhaskar), a rich girl. As expected, their parents oppose their love and as a result, the young couple decide to die together if they can't live together. They elope with the intention of committing suicide. But when the time comes, only Charu takes the extreme step. Kathir refrains for a reason...

title: Oru Modhal Oru Kadhal
synopsis: Oru modhal oru kadhal is a story of a guy (Vivek Rajagopal), who falls in love with a girl, and their trouble-filled journey from Chennai to Bangalore to Delhi giving troubles to his friends and family, portrayed hilariously.

title: Manal Naharam
synopsis: Manal Naharam explores the lives and predicaments experienced by people who go from India to the Arab countries for better dream and fortunes, leaving behind their trusted kith and kin. The story takes place in Dubai. The movie also deals with friendship as well as romance

title: Kantharvan
synopsis: Kantharvan is a new Tamil Movie directed by Salangai Durai and produced by South Indian Productions. Music scored by Alex Paul. Karthir and Honey Rose ...

title: Kadhalai Thavira Verondrum Illai
synopsis: Kadhalai Thavira Veru Ondrum Illai is an upcoming Tamil Movie. Directed by Selvabharathi. Yuvan and Saranya Mohan are in the lead roles.

title: Kaadu
synopsis: Velu agrees to go to jail for smuggling sandalwood to save his friend Karuna, whose aim is to become a forest officer. When Karuna's true colors come out, can Velu save the forest and its people?

title: Ivanuku Thannila Gandam
synopsis: A guy has to save his girl friend from a henchman.

title: Gnana Kirukkan
synopsis: The travails of a mother, her son, and the woman he meets

title: Ennamo Nadakkudhu
synopsis: Burma, a gangster and politician, is after Vijay, who, he thinks, has swindled him of a huge amount of money. But Vijay claims that the money was stolen from him. Is he lying? If not, who has stolen the money and why?

title: En Vazhi Thani Vazhi
synopsis: A police officer who deals with the criminals in his own way.

title: 13 aam Pakkam Paarkka
synopsis: 13 Aam Pakkam Paarkka is a horror movie based on an unknown book, where the 13th page of the book harbors evil. Whoever reads the book gets possessed by the evil, and threatens to ruin their life.

title: 1 Pandhu 4 Run 1 Wicket
synopsis: The story revolves around a cricket fanatic, who is watching an India versus Pakistan final match. What happens in the last ball of the match becomes very crucial from the story's perspective.

title: Kirumi
synopsis: An undercover Police informer Kathir's life turns up and down after his friend murdered by a group of thugs.

title: Vellaikaara Durai
synopsis: Murugan falls in love with Yamuna and with the help of his friend Paandi, he saves Yamuna from a marriage with a notorious money lender.

title: Un Samayal Arayil
synopsis: A couple's long-distance romance evolves over a mutual love of cooking and food.

title: Naanum Rowdy Dhaan
synopsis: A guy who wants to be a good rowdy tries to help his girlfriend whose parents were murdered by a real rowdy.

title: Puli
synopsis: A virtuous soldier who tries to help people from a evil queen and a throne-seeking commander.

title: Komban
synopsis: An angry young man tries to give up his violent ways after his marriage runs into trouble. But his nemesis will not rest until he is killed.

title: Romeo Juliet
synopsis: Karthik and Aishwarya loves each other deeply, but Aishwarya ditches him when she realizes he's poor. Karthik doesn't give up easily though so Aishwarya has to find other ways to shake him off.

title: Pasanga 2
synopsis: The frustrated parents of two hyperactive kids realize to understand their kids and their wonders that no one else seems to appreciate by the help of an understanding doctor and his teacher wife.

title: Vedalam
synopsis: Ajith Kumar as Ganesh clashes with a threesome of criminal brothers when he tips off the police. However, when they try to get revenge on him, they realize he has a past score to settle with them too.
